body.name: Dokotoo Womens Polo Shirts Short Sleeve V Neck Collared Button Down Shirt Tops Ribbed Knit T Shirt Summer Outfits
features: Women's ribbed knitted tops, polo shirts is made of lightweight and soft fabric, breathable, skin-friendly,great to wear in Spring, Summer, Fall.
Casual short sleeve, Collared Neck, V Neck, Solid Color, Regular slim fit to make a trendy and cute summer crop tops for women.
Short sleeve and cute collared v neckline design make you feel more feminine and sweet in this women summer tops,knitted material looks stylish but not too revealing.
The summer knitted tops is great to wear it with your favorite skinny jeans, leggings, skirts etc.And this breathable pullover sweater tops will provides you a pleasing wearing experience.
Wash Recommended With Cold Water/Do Not Bleach/Hang Or Line Dry/Wash with like colours,that will increase the durability of your clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks & Feels Nice...
reviews.reviewText: I read a lot of the reviews about sizing.For me this shirt was very nice. It fit true to size on me. I wear a large and ordered a large and it fits very nicely without being too tight or clingy.I really like the material. It is fairly stretchy, a little on the thicker side, but oh so soft on the skin! It seems well made and with good material. Color is the same as it is on the model. Buttons are sewn on well. Did not find any loose threads or bad stitching. Seems to be on the dressy/nicer side of polo shirts. Has a few wrinkles from being rolled up and shipped, but I'm sure they will come out with ease. Happy with this find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a comfortable, casual, short-sleeved shirt. I usually wear size-2-4/small, but I ordered this in a medium and I'm glad I did. Because there is some stretch, a small would have fit, but I like the little extra length of the medium (I'm slim but not short...) and it still fits okay in the shoulders. I find this happens fairly often for me. I like the red dahlia color, but I couldn't get a good picture of it. 😜 I knew this when I ordered it, but this is yet another shirt that can't go in the dryer, so just be aware of that. This is nice. I wouldn't mind having it in a couple of other colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering polo that is comfortable, light, stretchy, and well made
reviews.reviewText: This polo has a very flattering fit. The material is comfortable, light, and stretchy, but also thick enough to appear of good quality. The material does feel a bit too 'polyester' for my preference and I would prefer if it had a more cottony feel, but it's still comfortable so I wouldn't consider this a major issue. The fit is perfect for a medium. Loose but also slim and flattering. The shirt seems well made and the color is a beautiful warm rustic red that looks just like the photo. I really like this shirt!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Slim Fit, so size up
reviews.reviewText: I liked everything about this shirt, except it does run small. So note to self, slim fit means size up. It's a little snug for my taste but my daughter will be able to wear it; hopefully she likes it. Other than running small, IMO, it's a very nice shirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice shirt. My wife really LOVES it and has raved about it each time she wears it. The stitching is perfect and it has washed perfectly after several wearings. It is perfect to wear to work, but also sporty and attractive for the weekends.Fits perfectly (125lb, 5'6', small size)It's a winner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The material is soft and stretchy. I’m wearing a medium and it’s form fitting. It’s comfortable to wear. Feels light weight and breathable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fitted slim cut. Stretchy. Perfect fit for me. Check measurements given on size chart.
reviews.reviewText: I have this DOKOTOO Women’s short sleeve V neck collared slim fit ribbed knit polo shirt in the Red Dahlia color, size Medium and it is as pictured and described and fits me as I had hoped, like it fits the model. I checked the exact measurements and sizes chart (DOKOTOO size chart, NOT the Size guide - US T shirt) before ordering. I measure 36B, 28, 37. The fabric is ribbed and stretchy with a structured collar, making it slightly dressy. I am not a big fan of short sleeves on me but these are a good, longer length short sleeve. I also like the longer length of this top and the fact it is not cropped or shortened. This arrived with a few wrinkles that easily steamed out with my hand steamer. Comfy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars soft & comfortably fitted
reviews.reviewText: Got the Mist Blue color and it looks exactly as pictured on the model of its Amazon product photos. The Small size fits my petite athletic daughter who wears an adult size 0-2 in a fitted way. Not really body-hugging but its viscose-elastane fabric tends to be stretchy & cling despite its somewhat thick material. This fabric needs specific laundry care too (cool water & hang-/line-dry) since its fabric will shrink. My laundering tendency will likely get this shirt accidentally washed in warm water washer and dried on high heat @ some point since I tend to forget which clothing needs special care. So, this will likely shrink some but there's still room for it to shrink since its hem is long on my daughter & there's still some looseness to its width. It looks good on her and she wears it buttoned up except for the topmost button. She gives this a 5-star. Will update if this shirt shrinks too much with how I typically launder.Well-recommended.
